ygData.subject: RE: Pugius Dagger
ygData.msgSnippet: The one time I saw the lesser blade fiend it was also on the first floor just inside the left porch doorway.  However, I was told by my party members it spawns
ygData.messageBody:
The one time I saw the lesser blade fiend it was also on the first floor
just inside the left porch doorway. However, I was told by my party members
it spawns in the basement. The time I saw it someone had started a massive
train from the basement. They fled to the zone and all kinds of nasty stuff
followed them, including the blade fiend. After the train went by, someone
in our party went inside, saw the blade fiend inside the doorway, attacked
it and pulled it out to the courtyard. I think what happened is that the
party that started the train zoned so the mobs in the train all started to
move back to their spawn point. The blade fiend never made it outside so
hung around the doorway before heading back to the basement.

Galtin of E'ci

> Actually, I think it spawns on the main floor, but I could be mistaken.
> Each time I saw it, it was hanging out on the main floor. I do agree with
> the level... It was conning blue to me at level 20 or 21, IIRC.
>
>
> > It's found in Unrest, off the Lesser Blade Fiend (thus far,
> > my favorite
> > mob with regards to looks: picture a rock dervish with
> > weapons instead of
> > stones). The spawn is supposedly rare in itself, with the
> > Gladius being
> > the rare drop. I've heard rumor it comes from the basement,
> > but it was
> > blue to me somewhere in my high teens.
> >
>
